def_cn: (对不知其姓名的男士或上级的尊称)先生，长官
def_en: People sometimes say sir as a very formal and polite way of addressing a man whose name they do not know or a man of superior rank. For example, a shop assistant might address a male customer as sir .

def_cn: (用于爵士或准男爵的姓名前)爵士
def_en: Sir is the title used in front of the name of a knight or baronet.

def_cn: (正式信函或商务信函开头的称呼语)先生，阁下(写信给某组织时使用 Dear sirs)
def_en: You use the expression Dear sir at the beginning of a formal letter or a business letter when you are writing to a man. You use Dear sirs when you are writing to an organization.
